name: Shallipopi
description: '''Crown Uzama''' (born April 12, 2000), known professionally as '''Shallipopi''', is a Nigerian singer, rapper, and songwriter. He gained recognition in 2023 with the release of his single, "[[Shallipopi#Career|Elon Musk]]". He followed up with the extended play ''Planet Pluto'' (2023). His debut studio album, ''[[Shallipopi#Career 2023|Presido La Pluto]]'', released in 2023, was met with commercial success, debuting at number 1 on the [[TurnTable Top 50|''TurnTable'' Top 50]]. It also debuted atop [[Apple Music]]'s⁣⁣ Top 100 albums. His second studio album, ''[[Shakespopi]]'' (2024) became Shallipopi's second chart-topping album. The song "[[ASAP (Shallipopi song)|ASAP]]" from the album reached number one on the [[TurnTable Top 100 Songs|''TurnTable'' Top 100.]] In 2025, he released the single "[[Laho (song)|Laho]]" under his record label, Plutomania Records and [[Since '93]].
